description:
Large apartment in a Condo with an amazing sunrise view over East river. 
Very convenient area with restaurants, shops, ... close to Central Park and Museum mile! There is an AC in the apartment and elevators in the building.

Comfortable queen size sofa bed available the living-room

Subway 4, 5, 6 Station 96
Bus M15, M96
Taxi!
name: Cozy apartment in Upper East!
review: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
